statements: SELECT * FROM user_transactions WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM user_transactions WHERE category = 'Grocery';
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM user_transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM user_transactions WHERE amount BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY transaction_id;
SELECT category, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM user_transactions GROUP BY category;
SELECT * FROM user_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, amount FROM user_transactions WHERE user_id = 123 AND amount > 100 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT category, COUNT(*) FROM user_transactions GROUP BY category HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;
SELECT category, AVG(amount) AS avg_amount FROM user_transactions GROUP BY category ORDER BY avg_amount DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM user_transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_amount > 5000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE category = 'food' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT user_id, age FROM users WHERE gender = 'male' AND age < 25;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE gender = 'Female' AND age BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.amount, u.username FROM transactions t JOIN users u ON t.user_id = u.user_id WHERE t.transaction_date > '2021-01-01' AND t.amount > 1000 ORDER BY t.transaction_date DESC;

SELECT u.username, t.amount, t.category FROM users u LEFT JOIN transactions t ON u.user_id = t.user_id WHERE t.transaction_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2020-12-31' ORDER BY u.username ASC,t.amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, user_name, user_email FROM users ORDER BY user_name ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM recommendations WHERE recommendation_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, user_name FROM users WHERE user_phone LIKE '%123%' ORDER BY user_name DESC;
SELECT user_email, user_phone FROM users LEFT JOIN transactions ON users.user_id = transactions.user_id WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE category = 'Food' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_name, recommendation_text FROM users INNER JOIN recommendations ON users.user_id = recommendations.user_id;
SELECT user_name, user_email, recommendation_text FROM users JOIN recommendations USING (user_id) WHERE recommendation_text LIKE '%great%';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT transaction_id, amount, category FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100.00;
SELECT recommendation_text FROM recommendations WHERE recommendation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT user_id, category_name FROM categories WHERE category_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, amount, category FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT category_name, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM categories JOIN transactions ON categories.category_id = transactions.category GROUP BY category_name;
SELECT user_id, recommendation_text, recommendation_date FROM recommendations WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM users WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01');
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT id, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT category_name FROM categories ORDER BY category_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, amount, category, timestamp FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT recommendation_text, date_issued FROM recommendations WHERE user_id = '7fd0d221-bcdb-4f48-bb35-1ce4e0e659c7';
SELECT id, username, email FROM users WHERE username='john_doe';
SELECT transaction_id, amount, category, timestamp FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS transaction_count FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT DISTINCT category_name FROM categories ORDER BY category_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, total_budget, remaining_budget FROM budgets WHERE user_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
